content:
xt of Mark, to bring it into line
with Pauline theology. To do that would be to embrace the kind of radical skepticism for which
Bart Ehrman’s Misquoting Jesus(HarperOne, 2007) has been so widely and justly censured. Still,
these textual data are puzzling. A Christian who took his scriptures seriously might think they
require some explanation.
